title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 539 – 553) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the Fishman Island Arc covering episodes 539-553, discussing Luffy and the crew's reunion with Jinbe, Nami's confrontation about Arlong, and the multi-episode flashback story about Fisher Tiger and Queen Otohime.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fishman Island Arc through episode 553

title: Ep 539 - Let the Flashbacks begin
author: Neowitch
description: A blog post discussing episode 539 and the beginning of the extensive flashback arc about Fisher Tiger and Queen Otohime that will dominate the next several episodes.

title: Never Watched One Piece - Episodes 538-539
author: Never Watched One Piece Blog
description: A first-time viewer's reaction to episodes 538-539, noting that episode 539 was the episode they'd been waiting for and discussing Nami's guarded reaction to Jinbe throughout the episodes.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time viewer reaction without future spoilers

title: Episode 539 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for episode 539 including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, manga chapters adapted, and production details.

title: One Piece - Yomigaeru Innen! Nami to Gyojin Kaizokudan!
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for episode 539 with rating of 7.5/10, including cast information and episode details.

title: Everything You Can Expect When This Iconic One Piece Saga Finally Returns
author: CBR
description: An article discussing highlights of the Fish-Man Island saga, including the introduction of Fisher Tiger and Queen Otohime's backstory that begins in episode 539.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fish-Man Island Saga
